##########################
About DAVE_core
##########################

.. image:: /images/dave_logo.png
		:width: 50em
		:align: center

.. |br| raw:: html

    <br />

|br|
|br|
|br|

DAVE is an open source data fusion tool for automated energy network generation based on open data

.. start-badges
